title.narrative: Implementing the Enhanced Integrated Framework Program to Support Ethiopia?s effort integrating into the Global Trading System

description.narrative: The Government of Ethiopia (GoE) is submitting a proposal to the Enhanced Integrated Framework (EIF) Executive Secretariat at the WTO seeking assistance to strengthen its capacity to implement the country?s trade development agenda through mainstreaming trade into all other development plans with a view to achieve growth and development objectives of the National five year plan: the Growth and Transformation Plan (GTP) to facilitate the country?s effort for poverty reduction and sustainable development and enhance integration into the global trading system through coordinated delivery of trade-related technical assistance and support. The proposal is made up of several parts, including the project objective, methodology, scope and limitations, a situation analysis, a results framework, management arrangements, risks, a work plan, a budget and annexes. The EIF is a partnership involving Least Developed Countries (LDCs), donors and international organizations to address the trade-relate

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
